Posts.Content: Jun 11, 2018 08:42PM bethmom wrote: hi! Joining the liver metsters thread. I am er+, her2-.Carbo/gemzar did nothing for me after 6 cycles. I had a pet scan and have new lesions in liver, many bones and in lymph nodes in my neck. I’ve already been on the orals , has a very good run on xeloda for 2 1/2 years so hoping someone could tell me what chemo you moved to after others have failed. My onco is suggesting doxcil or navelbine. Has anyone gone back to orals at anytime ? Thanks for any advice.
Posts.Title: How are people with liver mets doing? blondie1 JFL

Posts.Content: bethmom wrote: trying to find out how many people have lost their hair while on navelbine. I have had some thinning, but it seems to have slowed down. I’m doing penguin cold caps, but I don’t want to continue with them if they aren’t necessary, how long did navelbine work for you? My oncologist told me I will be on this as long as it keeps working. Have only had one cycle of 3 weeks on and one off so far. Thanks for any inut about your experience with navelbine Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Navelbine bethmom blainejennifer
